com.ibm.webest.persistence.service.impl
Class CalculationFacade

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.webest.persistence.service.impl.CalculationFacade
All Implemented Interfaces:
CalculationFacadeLocal, CalculationFacadeRemote
@DeclareRoles(value={"admin","estimator","manager"})
@RolesAllowed(value={"admin","estimator","manager"})
public class CalculationFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CalculationFacadeRemote, CalculationFacadeLocal

Provides functionality to retrieve calculation relevant data from the database.
Primarily used for parameter lookup.

Author:
Gregor Schumm
